welcomingText:
$39494a Back Developer with some front-end knowledges


 This website is command prompt based.

 To navigate you will need to execute commands through the input field
 in the bottom of your screen.

 To know what commands you can execute, execute the 'help' command.

help.content: Here is the list of the availables commands :  whoami : This command allow you to learn more about me.  lang < language code > : Allow you to change the website's language.   Example to make the website french : lang fr  clear : Clear the terminal.  portfolio : Show my portfolio.

lang.success:
The lang is succesfuly changed !
To obtain the new command list, execute the 'help' command.

content.name: My first website
content.description: This is the first website I made, he is now replaced by this one.
